code: AddInstruments(   name,   manufacturer = "Cytek",   uv = 16,   violet = 16,   blue = 14,   yellowgreen = 10,   red = 8,   organization_name = NULL,   organization_website = NULL,   githubusername = NULL,   TheFCSFolderPath = NULL,   CytekbioExportFolderPath = NULL )

title: Adds Instruments to the base Webpage — AddInstruments
text: name Desired name instrument manufacturer Instrument Manufacturer uv Number UV detectors violet Number violet detectors blue Number blue detectors yellowgreen Number yellow-green detectors red Number red detectors organization_name Name organization, default NULL defaults value provided FolderSetup organization_website Link organization website, default NULL defaults value provided FolderSetup githubusername GitHub user name, default NULL defaults value provided FolderSetup TheFCSFolderPath Default NULL sets path Cytek file.path 'C:/CytekbioExport/Setup/DailyQC', alternate file locations manufacturers, please provide file.path fcs folder location CytekbioExportFolderPath Default NULL sets path Cytek file.path 'C:/CytekbioExport', alternate locations CytekbioExport folder, please provide file path.
